MS MCQs

    Automate cloud resource management - Infrastructure as code

    »

    1. Which of the following statements best describes the primary purpose of Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC)?

      The principal objective of IaC is to simplify the process of deploying cloud resources to two or more cloud environments.

      The principal objective of IaC is to ensure the high availability of virtual machines and other cloud resources.

      The principal objective of IaC is to define a process for achieving an outcome (for example, the process for provisioning a set of cloud resources) without having to define the outcome itself.

      The principal objective of IaC is to make the composition of a solution deployed to the cloud both explicitly definable and dynamic like a program.


    2. Which of the following actions might a cloud administrator perform with an IaC/CM tool?

      Use XML or another declarative language to define the resources that comprise a cloud solution, and then use an IaC/CM tool to deploy the solution to a cloud data center.

      Revise an XML document that defines a cloud solution to include new cloud resources, and then use an IaC/CM tool to update the solution in a cloud data center.

      Revise an XML document that defines a cloud solution to remove some resources and modify others, and then use an IaC/CM tool to update the solution in a cloud data center.

      All of the above.
